JobFullDesc: Requires US Citizenship and TS/SCI + FSP clearance level. Capacity Supply Chain & Provisioning (CSCP) is the organization behind one of the World’s largest Cloud Infrastructure responsible for powering all Microsoft Products and Services as well as powering Microsoft’s “…Cloud First…” mission.
